programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Patrick Duffy (7/22/87)
programme.desc: Patrick brings Johnny a hilarious wedding gift: A set of towels With Velcro monograms for quick switches.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Alan Alda (5/19/81)
programme.desc: M*A*S*H* star Alan Alda discusses his career and the impact of celebrity on his life.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Teri Garr (3/25/83)
programme.desc: Teri shows clip from Oscar-nom’d Tootsie performance, parses success in show biz vs. recognition as actress.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Sally Field (2/20/79)
programme.desc: Sally Field details her relationship with Burt Reynolds. Plus, Buddy Hackett appears.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Burt Reynolds (3/2/77)
programme.desc: Burt Reynolds shows his vacation videos and talks about moving in next door to Barbra Streisand.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '50s - Charlton Heston (2/14/79)
programme.desc: Charlton Heston describes his role in diffusing the hijacking of a United Airlines jet.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '50s - Jack Benny (7/20/73)
programme.desc: Jack Benny doesn't enjoy Paris and Joe Namath doesn't understand politics. Elke Sommer also appears.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - George Miller (4/7/78)
programme.desc: George Miller does standup & Robert Mitchum talks marijuana. Plus Dick Van Patten & Dennis Madalone

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Joan Rivers (10/15/82)
programme.desc: Hear what Joan Rivers has to say about retouched magazine covers, Gone With The Wind and Dolly Parton.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Ed Begley, Jr. (9/28/84)
programme.desc: Ed Begley Jr. is joined by Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom's Kate Capshaw and comedian Bobby Kelton.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.desc: Was Richard Pryor’s grandmother really a tyrant? Hear Pryor’s recollections of grandma battle ax.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Goldie Hawn (2/22/78)
programme.desc: The star of Laugh-in and Oscar winner Goldie Hawn talks about giving birth. Buck Henry has some thoughts.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - Father Guido Sarducci (2/28/86)
programme.desc: Father Guido Sarducci stops by the set to talk about his pet dog and starting his own church.

programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '50s - Bob Hope (12/21/78)
programme.desc: Merry Christmas, Mr. Hope! Bob says he’s spending the holiday with his grandkids in Reno.
